## üî• Firebase - Choose ONE Option

### Option A: Base64 (Recommended - Easiest)

**Remove this line:**
```
FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_PATH=./config/firebase-service-account.json
```

**Add this instead:**
```
FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_
```

### Option B: Individual Variables (Alternative)

**Remove this line:**
```
FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_PATH=./config/firebase-service-account.json
```

**Add these instead:**
```
FIREBASE_CLIENT_EMAIL=firebase-adminsdk-fbsvc@emirimo-704d1.iam.gserviceaccount.com
FIREBASE_PRIVATE_KEY=-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIEvgIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCBKgwggSkAgEAAoIBAQDYIg5o1/dOiCES\nmSua53kIbR6tMUzOmkoXlEYzAMWjCtAS69vGY0HUjzAhj3MO8WDE8yV7imLXUz2p\n4y3GK3gavtBjOdne+AHsWd7in8pzYJ/9LK1sigpU70i7WaisIHczNUUF3Wo9Zg3P\nvt6RhrWSRzjy0gGFAS5ncAHtICZv6D4lrGTbEP1hvoM+siXyFfozFE15BU5HBPSq\nXzBNpDlPbsSoEKpP59mDUNFyrfUwFVvj9e4mVtUPUydUn0T/SFusmB1yOJqOTtcc\nTqSlPTshWBIY+W60lcEo1V5GvPf9ybfW0ic98DpjLTO6ptRuUAwJzeOvX73oMAjq\nWxeVQUqfAgMBAAECggEAXJxrND2mOL5X/ZIofx3EXPn09R103ep66ROd6OjhxvUx\nJ4ptB9ssMBqS8y52jOadIodVflRT+hQvDgbMbGff9QXiYUI+uy3mFRKFUPJLW5kB\ntQhZ33Je7voBXlYS0n6u1QB0bQjtJxX9wRD2acEhOGbQXivifs18xtHV4XevQK+n\nqtfq6FwfA5WCp+nWPNsgNWM5QedobY3SuWC8eiBqHDvXR/BLRAUrT1iAM6lLJ4yK\nSpJhGvSLMn7n3EvsXsZN8CkEd8kt24RLH+oUHGwTLK+dM6Ihkvosu4u/YWesLXnw\n+ViPUuDmnei0/n/M4PAoIqf9xVMUL9fGYp1jZi504QKBgQDspgBtRKumCf8ixWbu\nit6kRA3/sNlrjEeswI/WC5DU2CRefJ1UELj69jjtV0GSX6nrJmDWX73csmzM1x20\nohN6J0E5LAOhk8thDi8lchwPY6ouZutGyCcFGSreQ2+kJJk1tGYTATDCudwCTdUb\nh+iVUIoAkkkTmdJn4cNu5bWWqQKBgQDpzpXDL223LK2UdZs8l9ROZijnJFRpv85A\nrq/+iqsxTNiiQ/Vp3KbTbLuRE16KTDOh+dWHYcH90rdUPmyb4WvTn6PTjEI7EHtq\nM8ewliXJjY6V57NrwYQWWaX8/CU4YUrsQMiCxEjxl337TPEfveaWg3E1dP89vhNU\ni6FSahBMBwKBgQDl/H61suNOvrBiTo62jefKpQkl0e27g920moAveZYMBPNzkJAm\nPwpHfDvfDcoAQ1CT4/yA2xNeBVmPyhBomIttT/EnawssYMJrVKmlLrzuh+HAru1B\nIQwq/EaZM9iwIZF0jBoXpjSJSq/y3UmbM/5p/pff7ktu7TN7GgIhKMXN4QKBgQCG\n46q/izNvRJV4W0mOccII4SOkBu+0evZRlvbuka4mqUEqjK6fvq94tviXwGcAvuni\n/zJUAvBasiEWt1UNscX1t9paiEcFsIKjSPBiTp3KZKLolV6MQn8kLeB3zjjjCC6j\nktSbrQawa0hBnahXOcY4++hqgO9o/apFUrFlzM9OLQKBgA370o0MQZd+5lAZoLsn\n50feKmhbgQRtWUtHtdKY9jWrFCkaHoXuVA/Jmt1gsQJOmUkOdvONG4KeokPPU2Jd\n1pqq5i77oekcELOxtsrqklFlCt6ffgqiI+yScwCnCBs0fJDutayNODxT6OwD1Daq\n7Njuh4JUn/5ePXJGpe35RGYm\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----\n
```

## üìù Complete Updated Firebase Section

**Replace your current Firebase section with ONE of these:**

### Using Base64 (Recommended):
```env
FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=emirimo-704d1
FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=emirimo-704d1.firebasestorage.app
FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_
```

### Using Individual Variables:
```env
FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=emirimo-704d1
FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=emirimo-704d1.firebasestorage.app
FIREBASE_CLIENT_EMAIL=firebase-adminsdk-fbsvc@emirimo-704d1.iam.gserviceaccount.com
FIREBASE_PRIVATE_KEY=-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIEvgIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCBKgwggSkAgEAAoIBAQDYIg5o1/dOiCES\nmSua53kIbR6tMUzOmkoXlEYzAMWjCtAS69vGY0HUjzAhj3MO8WDE8yV7imLXUz2p\n4y3GK3gavtBjOdne+AHsWd7in8pzYJ/9LK1sigpU70i7WaisIHczNUUF3Wo9Zg3P\nvt6RhrWSRzjy0gGFAS5ncAHtICZv6D4lrGTbEP1hvoM+siXyFfozFE15BU5HBPSq\nXzBNpDlPbsSoEKpP59mDUNFyrfUwFVvj9e4mVtUPUydUn0T/SFusmB1yOJqOTtcc\nTqSlPTshWBIY+W60lcEo1V5GvPf9ybfW0ic98DpjLTO6ptRuUAwJzeOvX73oMAjq\nWxeVQUqfAgMBAAECggEAXJxrND2mOL5X/ZIofx3EXPn09R103ep66ROd6OjhxvUx\nJ4ptB9ssMBqS8y52jOadIodVflRT+hQvDgbMbGff9QXiYUI+uy3mFRKFUPJLW5kB\ntQhZ33Je7voBXlYS0n6u1QB0bQjtJxX9wRD2acEhOGbQXivifs18xtHV4XevQK+n\nqtfq6FwfA5WCp+nWPNsgNWM5QedobY3SuWC8eiBqHDvXR/BLRAUrT1iAM6lLJ4yK\nSpJhGvSLMn7n3EvsXsZN8CkEd8kt24RLH+oUHGwTLK+dM6Ihkvosu4u/YWesLXnw\n+ViPUuDmnei0/n/M4PAoIqf9xVMUL9fGYp1jZi504QKBgQDspgBtRKumCf8ixWbu\nit6kRA3/sNlrjEeswI/WC5DU2CRefJ1UELj69jjtV0GSX6nrJmDWX73csmzM1x20\nohN6J0E5LAOhk8thDi8lchwPY6ouZutGyCcFGSreQ2+kJJk1tGYTATDCudwCTdUb\nh+iVUIoAkkkTmdJn4cNu5bWWqQKBgQDpzpXDL223LK2UdZs8l9ROZijnJFRpv85A\nrq/+iqsxTNiiQ/Vp3KbTbLuRE16KTDOh+dWHYcH90rdUPmyb4WvTn6PTjEI7EHtq\nM8ewliXJjY6V57NrwYQWWaX8/CU4YUrsQMiCxEjxl337TPEfveaWg3E1dP89vhNU\ni6FSahBMBwKBgQDl/H61suNOvrBiTo62jefKpQkl0e27g920moAveZYMBPNzkJAm\nPwpHfDvfDcoAQ1CT4/yA2xNeBVmPyhBomIttT/EnawssYMJrVKmlLrzuh+HAru1B\nIQwq/EaZM9iwIZF0jBoXpjSJSq/y3UmbM/5p/pff7ktu7TN7GgIhKMXN4QKBgQCG\n46q/izNvRJV4W0mOccII4SOkBu+0evZRlvbuka4mqUEqjK6fvq94tviXwGcAvuni\n/zJUAvBasiEWt1UNscX1t9paiEcFsIKjSPBiTp3KZKLolV6MQn8kLeB3zjjjCC6j\nktSbrQawa0hBnahXOcY4++hqgO9o/apFUrFlzM9OLQKBgA370o0MQZd+5lAZoLsn\n50feKmhbgQRtWUtHtdKY9jWrFCkaHoXuVA/Jmt1gsQJOmUkOdvONG4KeokPPU2Jd\n1pqq5i77oekcELOxtsrqklFlCt6ffgqiI+yScwCnCBs0fJDutayNODxT6OwD1Daq\n7Njuh4JUn/5ePXJGpe35RGYm\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----\n
```

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes

1. **Remove** `FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_PATH` - This won't work on Render
2. **Choose ONE method**: Either Base64 OR Individual variables (not both)
3. **Base64 is recommended** - It's easier and less error-prone
4. **After adding variables**, Render will auto-redeploy
5. **Check logs** for: `‚úÖ Firebase initialized (Base64)` or `‚úÖ Firebase initialized (Individual credentials)`
